sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; /* =========================== Navigation Component =========================== Displays the top site navigation bar, including: - Logo + site name/tagline - Menu links (Home, Chefs, About, Contact) - Temporary Login button to access dashboard */ export default function Nav() { return (
{/* =========================== Brand / Logo =========================== */}
{/* Logo links to homepage */}
{/* The actual logo image */}
{/* Site title and tagline */}

Chefs2Table

Delicious meals, exceptional deals
{/* =========================== Menu Links =========================== */}
Home Chefs About Contact {/* Temporary dashboard login button */} Login
); }
